content:
Feature Request: I believe that the ability to for a user to drag the streams area to the right or left in order to make the names of the steams larger or smaller would provide a User Experience update.

DragTheStreamsWindow.jpg

Thank you for considering my recommendation.

@David Martin See #8191, which is vaguely related and has a suggestion for a workaround (stylebot chrome extension).

I agree this would be a nice upgrade to the experience, although I think it's something we've been a bit wary about tinkering with, since we sort of encourage short stream names and topic names, so the default width is probably "good enough" for most people.
